title: Is Unity IAP for Amazon or Samsung supported?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am looking to add Unity IAP for my Amazon Application
  • I am looking to add Unity IAP for my Tizen Application

sections.title: Cause
content: You may have tried to add Unity’s IAP service to your Samsung and/or Tizen application, but experienced issues when doing so.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Amazon is supported and will allow you to use Unity’s In App Purchasing service.
Samsung GALAXY Apps and the Tizen Store are now also supported.

sections.title: More InformationHow do I build for different Android stores e.g. switch from Google Play to Amazon Appstore?
